content: the scarving artist jasmine stitch class the scarving artist jasmine stitch class in this class we will be learning the jasmine stitch pattern worked flat as in the christmas ornament and in the round as in the coaster materials needed about 10g yarn per item any size hook i recommend starting at about a 5mm scissors tapestry needle project level abbreviations chain - chain lp - loop repeat - repeat skip - skip st - stitch gauge 14 sts & 13 row in 4 pattern blocked finished dimensions tree - 4 across the bottom 4 tall coaster - 5 diameter youtube tutorials full tree pattern https //youtu be/q5b3qjufwku si=dndf0zbqxpruo06w full coaster pattern coming soon how to make a magic_ring coming soon special stitches 2 puff - pull up the lp on the hook to the height you want your puff *yo insert the hook into the top of the previous puff yo and pull up a lp repeat from * 2 more times *yo insert the hook into the bottom of the previous puff yo and pull up a lp repeat from * 2 more times hold on to the working yarn at the base of the puff yo and pull through all 13 lps insert the hook into the lp you are holding onto yo and pull through both lps on the hook chain 1 3 puff - pull up the lp on the hook to the height you want your puff *yo insert the hook into the top of the previous puff pattern & images © 2024 the scarving artist 02 the scarving artist jasmine stitch class stitch chart tree puff chain tree pattern row 1 foundation create a slipknot chain 1 pull up the lp on the hook to the height of your puff st *yo insert the hook into the chain 1 yo and pull up a lp to the height of your puff st repeat from * 2 more times you will have 7 lps on the hook hold the working yarn at the base of the puff without letting go of that yo and pull through all 7 lps now insert the hook through the lp you are holding on to yo and pull that lp through all lps on the hook 1 lp on the hook chain 1 in subsequent puffs you will be inserting the hook into the top of the previous puff rather than into the chain see pic below repeat this row so you have a total of 5 puffs pattern & images © 2024 the scarving artist 03 the scarving artist jasmine stitch class row 2 pull up a lp to the height you want your puffs *yo insert the hook into the top of the previous puff yo and pull up a lp repeat from * 2 more times *yo insert the hook into the bottom of the previous puff yo and pull up a lp repeat from * 2 more times you will have a total of
